contest-event.event-date:
May 12, 1877 D Holme Mills Contest
Holme Mills Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
holme-mills-contest
None
Holme Mills, Marsden Additional source: The Huddersfield Daily Chronicle (West Yorkshire, England), Monday, May 14, 1877; pg. 3; Issue 3048.
12 bands entered, 11 attended.
1st prize: £20, 2nd prize: £15, 3rd prize: £10, 4th prize: £6
Dec. 9, 2011, 10:36 p.m. March 23, 2017, 4:53 p.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Les Huguenots [unknown arranger]
2 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift William Tell [arr. Swift]
3 Stalybridge Old Band Richard Sourbutts Reminiscences of Gounod
4 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Les Huguenots [unknown arranger]
5 Hinchliffe Mill Band John Gladney Jnr Stiffelio [unknown arranger]
5 Oldham Rifles Band Edwin Swift Tannhäuser [arr. Swift]
Unknown Result Clayton le Moors Isaac Marsden William Tell [unknown arranger]
